title: Carpaccio de saumon et pommes vertes, crème acidulé aux herbes
intro: Pastry cotton candy cotton candy. Sesame snaps bonbon ice cream gingerbread jelly-o candy topping. Dessert macaroon fruitcake dragée. Muffin apple pie macaroon tootsie roll. Brownie cheesecake sugar plum donut marzipan tootsie roll.

directions.step: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Tear a large sheet of aluminum foil. Place carrots on foil and sprinkle with walnut oil, cognac, honey, and cinnamon.
Wrap up tightly and roast for 25 to 35 minutes until carrots are tender, yet crisp.
